website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Threadborne Shift is a stylish lifestyle shoe. While its DNA has some unique elements, it could use some improvement in comfort and functionality. Wearers may have to use protection (such as band aids) on the heel area to avoid being grazed. Although this Under Armour Threadborne shoe lacks features, it makes up for its price.
pros: Most users love the look and style of the Under Armour Threadborne Shift
It has a rubber outsole that provides durability and traction
Its synthetic suede saddle improves the style of the shoe
The breathable upper has a compression-like fit which brings a light and directional toughness
cons: The Under Armour Threadborne Shift needs improvement in the comfort department as observed by some wearers
Some users were disappointed with the lack of support by the shoe
A handful of Threadborne Shift owners noticed that the shoe rubs their heel
More than a couple of them complained that they were hurt because of the problem
A reviewer saw that the gray colorway has quality issues, including glue stains and material inconsistencies

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, little support.
customer_reviews.text: Not the normal Under Armour fit; the band across the top of the foot is very tight. The arch support is lacking. The look is good, but I can only wear the show for a couple hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: PoorBoy

customer_reviews.title: Proper wear & comfort & most importantly style...
customer_reviews.text: I was involved in an accident before, and right foot has not been the same ever since. Originally I wear a size 12/13 and due to the accident I wear a size 15 now. But these shoes are my favorite because they for just right... hate the fact they discontinued these style from the UA brand because I’ve been a fan I’m on my sixth pair....
customer_reviews.author: Ariel  Ruano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Fit perfect and have had a lot of comments on them
customer_reviews.author: mike buxton

customer_reviews.title: Great looking lightweight shoe
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and very comfortable. Great shoe for a good price. Only con I'd give these is that they aren't necessarily great for running or walking, but seeing as these are more meant to be a lifestyle shoe (as seen on UA's website) I don't really mind much, and can't take any points off for that.
customer_reviews.author: Donnelly Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: They look sharp on the pictures, but out of the box they look insane good!!! I love it, feels comfortable, light, and good looking!
customer_reviews.author: lookool

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great quality, and very comfortable. Another great shoe by Under Armour. Always what you expect.
customer_reviews.author: J.Scott

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable shie
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. Very comfortable as well. They are also very light weight and with the material that they’re made from the breathe very well. I took me while to lace them up though. The double slots were pretty confusing at first, especially when you try to mirror it on the other shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Giles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quickly delivered, sit on your leg perfectly, very light and breathable fabric!
customer_reviews.author: DenisR

customer_reviews.title: Like em. fits good
customer_reviews.text: Like em. fits good, very light and breathes, legs do not get swaty. Recomend
customer_reviews.author: lacoste

customer_reviews.title: Really stylish shoe I liked the look
customer_reviews.text: I used the shoe for 2 days and a piece of the rubber on the side on one of the shoes near the heel peeled off. Very disappointing..!!! Really stylish shoe I liked the look. And shoe fit good little loose in the heel area.
customer_reviews.author: vagas6

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Awesome design. Back piece, by the pull on tab, rubs my ankle a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Orin

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately in the picture it shows that the show lase ...
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately in the picture it shows that the show lase is only for decoration but the show came with a long lase that you have to work on it every morning !!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed fadhel

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were too NARROW. Also, was not crazy about the compression fit. Went for Skechers instead. Nice looking shoe, though.
customer_reviews.author: Siggy

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: looks good. great breathable material. good grip in rain but hurts my foot after wearing it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad shoe at all.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat it. I own 4 different pairs myself. Lightweight and comfortable, and I'm 6'3", 350 lbs. Size 15 shoe. In addition, I get compliments on them, as well at least once EVERYTIME I wear a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Thuron Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Shoes Run Small
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really liked the shoes. Unfortunately I can't wear them. They run a 1/2 size small. So I normally wear a 11.5 which is what I ordered. I can force my foot into them but they hurt. I needed a 12.
customer_reviews.author: polygrinder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: FOR THE PRICE AND THE WAY IT FITS CAN NOT COMPLAIN 5 STARS
customer_reviews.author: Craig

product_meta.title: Under Armour Mens 3020895 Threadborne Heat Seeker
product_meta.description: Fully-knit, bootie construction with heathered Threadborne upper for a breathable, compression-like fit that delivers lightweight directional strength. Synthetic suede saddle for elevated style & premium support. Flexible, elastic straps locks in the forefoot & heel. Subtle UNDER ARMOUR wordmark on back heel & tongue. Rubber outsole for traction & durability. For best fit: we recommend going down a half size. Weight: 9.46 oz.
feature_bullets: Fully knit, bootie construction with Threadborne upper for a breathable, compression like fit that delivers lightweight directional strength
Synthetic suede saddle for elevated style & premium support
Flexible, elastic bands lock in the forefoot & heel
Subtle UNDER ARMOUR wordmark on back heel & tongue
